title: Tourism industry growth expectations according to travel experts 2018
summary: The graph shows the Share respondents of growth expectations according Response .
You can see that Significantly_grow has the lowest Share respondents , averaging at £ 1 , Slightly_grow is a little bit higher coming in at £ 58 .
Slightly_decline is a little higher again , coming in at £ 11 ; Then a bit more of a jump to £ 1 for Significantly_decline and the Tourism expensive , £ 56 Share for No_change expectations .
gold: This statistic shows the results of a survey asking travel industry representatives and stakeholders at the London WTM exhibition ( UK ) to what extent do they expect the tourism industry to grow or decline in 2018 . Of respondents , 56 percent believed that the tourism industry will grow slightly in 2018 .
